text: Ani je loka allahasivaya dusaryanna pukaratata tyanna apasabda vaparu naka, an'yatha satru banuna ajanatepani tedekhila allahasathi apasabda vaparatila. Asa prakare amhi pratyeka janasamuhasathi tyance karma susobhita banavile ahe, maga tyanna apalya palanakartyakadeca paratayace ahe. Yastava to tyanna tyababata sucita karila je kahi te karita rahile
